attributes.action: Bring back and enforce our heritage on standard measure, Farenheight, miles, feet, inches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the Eu has declared their intentions not to persure metrification of the United Kingdom, we want the Prime Minister to reinstate all imperial measure.  Metric may be placed beside our measure but not to replace our measuring system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
